page.title: 14Belford Health Centre.
page.content: The Health Centre houses 3 doctors who treat patients from at least 10 surrounding villages including Chatton Seahouses,and Holy Island.There are about 4000 patients registered.Each doctor is on duty for 102 hours per week on average and drives about 360 miles each week,as more time is spent visiting homes than in the surgery. The Health Visitor has an office upstairs where she can be contacted each morning.She runs a baby clinic once a fortnight in Belford to which mothers can bring their babies for weighing and to discuss any problems they might have. The District Nurse also treats patients in the Health Centre changing bandages,checking mothers who are expecting babies and so on.
